org.locationtech.geowave.core.geotime.store.query.api

Interface VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P extends Persistable,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type for input parameters
    R - the result type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AggregationQueryBuilder<P,R,org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>>, BaseQueryBuilder<R,AggregationQuery<P,R,org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>,VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>>, BaseVectorQueryBuilder<R,AggregationQuery<P,R,org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>,VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VectorAggregationQueryBuilderImpl

    public interface VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P extends Persistable,R>
extends AggregationQueryBuilder<P,R,org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>>, BaseVectorQueryBuilder<R,AggregationQuery<P,R,org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>,VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>>
    An aggregation query builder particular for vector data. This should be preferentially used to build AggregationQuery's for SimpleFeature data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> bboxOfResults(String... typeNames)
      convenience method for getting a bounding box of the results of a query.
      VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> bboxOfResultsForGeometryField(String typeName, String geomAttributeName)
      convenience method for getting a bounding box of the results of a query this can be particularly useful if you want to calculate the bbox on a different field than the default/indexed Geometry
      default VectorQueryConstraintsFactory constraintsFactory()
      This is the easiest approach to defining a set of constraints and can be used to create the constraints that are provided to the constraints method.
      static <P extends Persistable,R>
      VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R>      		 newBuilder()
      get a default implementation of this builder

      VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> timeRangeOfResultsForTimeField(String typeName, String timeAttributeName)
      convenience method for getting a time range of the results of a query this can be particularly useful if you want to calculate the time range on a specific time field

      • bboxOfResults

        VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> bboxOfResults(String... typeNames)
        convenience method for getting a bounding box of the results of a query. It uses the default geometry for a feature type which is also the indexed geometry.
        Parameters:
        typeNames - the type names to constrain by
        Returns:
        this builder

      • bboxOfResultsForGeometryField

        VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> bboxOfResultsForGeometryField(String typeName,
                                                                 String geomAttributeName)
        convenience method for getting a bounding box of the results of a query this can be particularly useful if you want to calculate the bbox on a different field than the default/indexed Geometry
        Parameters:
        typeName - the type name
        geomAttributeName - the geometry attribute name
        Returns:
        this builder

      • timeRangeOfResults

        VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> timeRangeOfResults(String... typeNames)
        convenience method for getting a time range of the results of a query. this has to use inferred or hinted temporal attribute names if uncertain what implicit time attributes are being used then explicitly set timeAttributeName in other method
        Parameters:
        typeNames - the type names to constrain by
        Returns:
        this builder

      • timeRangeOfResultsForTimeField

        VectorAggregationQueryBuilder<P,R> timeRangeOfResultsForTimeField(String typeName,
                                                                  String timeAttributeName)
        convenience method for getting a time range of the results of a query this can be particularly useful if you want to calculate the time range on a specific time field
        Parameters:
        typeName - the type names to constrain by
        timeAttributeName - the time attribute name
        Returns:
        this builder
